string.text: SFX Volume setting acts as a modifier to sound's base volume attribute, meaning sounds with maximum base volume (like gunfire) will be unaffected by values higher than 0.5
Stalker and mutant population settings available in Mod Configuration Menu/ZCP
More visual settings available in Mod Configuration Menu/SSS Settings
More fast travel settings available in Mod Configuration Menu/Fair Fast Travel
In-game anti-aliasing and SMAA settings are incompatible with 3D Shader Scopes.\nEnabling them will render magnifying sights' reticles invisible.
Player Protection setting is ineffective (overridden by Grok's Actor Damage Balancer).
Bullet Hit Power Factor setting is ineffective (overridden by Grok's Ballistics Overhaul).
Grok's Ballistics Overhaul includes recoil effects by default, enabling setting below is redundant and may cause fatal errors.
